summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges for transportation and special handling, along with payment instructions and a summary of the shipment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for FedEx services, indicating his use of shipping services.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice number is 1-596-42828, dated February 9, 2004.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD $30.56.
The invoice includes a transportation charge of $30.00 and a special handling charge of $1.46.
The payment is due by February 24, 2004.
The shipment was picked up on February 3, 2004, and delivered on February 4, 2004.
